actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (SELECT video_id,created_time,MAX(cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal)
													  ) as total_video_view_total_time
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
WHERE view_date >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
	and name is not null
group by video_id,created_time),
CTE_view_date as (SELECT video_id,created_time,total_video_view_total_time
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
WHERE view_date = '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	and name is not null
group by video_id,created_time,total_video_view_total_time)
select (sum(CTE_sumtotal.total_video_view_total_time - cast(CTE_view_date.total_video_view_total_time as decimal))/(3600*1000))
as total_video_view_total_time 
from CTE_sumtotal,CTE_view_date where CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
